channel.title: üè¢ National University of Singapore on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ National University of Singapore on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Accelerating Greedy Coordinate Gradient and General Prompt Optimization via Probe Sampling
item.description: Probe sampling accelerates Greedy Coordinate Gradient (GCG) and other prompt optimization methods by up to 5.6x, achieving equal or better attack success rates, making LLM safety research faster and m…

item.title: ALI-Agent: Assessing LLMs' Alignment with Human Values via Agent-based Evaluation
item.description: ALI-Agent uses LLM-powered agents for in-depth, adaptive assessment of LLMs’ alignment with human values, overcoming limitations of existing static benchmarks.

item.title: Almost Minimax Optimal Best Arm Identification in Piecewise Stationary Linear Bandits
item.description: PS…õBAI+ is a near-optimal algorithm for best arm identification in piecewise stationary linear bandits, efficiently detecting changepoints and aligning contexts for improved accuracy and minimal sampl…

item.title: AsyncDiff: Parallelizing Diffusion Models by Asynchronous Denoising
item.description: AsyncDiff accelerates diffusion model inference by 2.8x using asynchronous denoising and model parallelism, maintaining near-perfect image quality.

item.title: Brain-JEPA: Brain Dynamics Foundation Model with Gradient Positioning and Spatiotemporal Masking
item.description: Brain-JEPA: a novel brain dynamics foundation model leverages fMRI data via innovative gradient positioning and spatiotemporal masking to achieve state-of-the-art performance in diverse brain activity…

item.title: Can Simple Averaging Defeat Modern Watermarks?
item.description: Simple averaging of watermarked images reveals hidden patterns, enabling watermark removal and forgery, thus highlighting the vulnerability of content-agnostic watermarking methods.

item.title: Cross-Scale Self-Supervised Blind Image Deblurring via Implicit Neural Representation
item.description: Self-supervised blind image deblurring (BID) breakthrough! A novel cross-scale consistency loss and progressive training scheme using implicit neural representations achieves superior performance wit…

item.title: DETAIL: Task DEmonsTration Attribution for Interpretable In-context Learning
item.description: DETAIL: A novel attribution method reveals the impact of individual demonstrations in in-context learning, boosting interpretability and improving transformer-based model performance.

item.title: Dynamic Tuning Towards Parameter and Inference Efficiency for ViT Adaptation
item.description: Dynamic Tuning (DyT) significantly boosts Vision Transformer (ViT) adaptation by dynamically skipping less important tokens during inference, achieving superior performance with 71% fewer FLOPs than e…

item.title: EZ-HOI: VLM Adaptation via Guided Prompt Learning for Zero-Shot HOI Detection
item.description: EZ-HOI: Efficient Zero-Shot HOI detection adapts Vision-Language Models (VLMs) for Human-Object Interaction (HOI) tasks using a novel prompt learning framework, achieving state-of-the-art performance …

item.title: FreeSplat: Generalizable 3D Gaussian Splatting Towards Free View Synthesis of Indoor Scenes
item.description: FreeSplat achieves state-of-the-art novel view synthesis by accurately localizing 3D Gaussians from long image sequences, overcoming limitations of prior methods confined to narrow-range interpolation…

item.title: Implicit Curriculum in Procgen Made Explicit
item.description: C-Procgen reveals implicit curriculum in Procgen’s multi-level training, showing learning shifts gradually from easy to hard contexts.

item.title: Learning Macroscopic Dynamics from Partial Microscopic Observations
item.description: Learn macroscopic dynamics efficiently using only partial microscopic force computations! This novel method leverages sparsity assumptions and stochastic estimation for accurate, cost-effective modeli…

item.title: Learning-to-Cache: Accelerating Diffusion Transformer via Layer Caching
item.description: Learning-to-Cache (L2C) dramatically accelerates diffusion transformers by intelligently caching layer computations, achieving significant speedups with minimal performance loss.

item.title: Localized Zeroth-Order Prompt Optimization
item.description: Localized Zeroth-Order Prompt Optimization (ZOPO) efficiently finds high-performing local optima for prompt optimization in black-box LLMs, outperforming existing global optimization methods.

item.title: MomentumSMoE: Integrating Momentum into Sparse Mixture of Experts
item.description: MomentumSMoE boosts Sparse Mixture of Experts’ (SMoE) performance by integrating momentum, resulting in more stable training and robust models.

item.title: Monomial Matrix Group Equivariant Neural Functional Networks
item.description: Monomial-NFNs boost neural network efficiency by leveraging scaling/sign-flipping symmetries, resulting in fewer trainable parameters and competitive performance.

item.title: On Softmax Direct Preference Optimization for Recommendation
item.description: Softmax-DPO boosts LM-based recommender performance by directly optimizing for personalized ranking using a novel loss function that incorporates multiple negative samples, significantly outperforming…

item.title: Piecewise-Stationary Bandits with Knapsacks
item.description: A novel inventory reserving algorithm achieves near-optimal performance for bandit problems with knapsacks in piecewise-stationary settings, offering a competitive ratio of O(log(nmax/min)).

item.title: Remix-DiT: Mixing Diffusion Transformers for Multi-Expert Denoising
item.description: Remix-DiT: Boosting diffusion model image generation quality by cleverly mixing smaller basis models into numerous specialized denoisers, improving efficiency and lowering costs!

item.title: Revisiting Self-Supervised Heterogeneous Graph Learning from Spectral Clustering Perspective
item.description: SCHOOL: A novel SHGL framework enhancing spectral clustering with rank and dual consistency constraints, effectively mitigating noise and leveraging cluster-level information for improved downstream t…

item.title: RFLPA: A Robust Federated Learning Framework against Poisoning Attacks with Secure Aggregation
item.description: RFLPA: Secure Federated Learning resists poisoning attacks via efficient secure aggregation.

item.title: Semidefinite Relaxations of the Gromov-Wasserstein Distance
item.description: This paper introduces a novel, tractable semidefinite program (SDP) relaxation for the Gromov-Wasserstein distance, enabling the computation of globally optimal transportation plans.

item.title: SlimSAM: 0.1% Data Makes Segment Anything Slim
item.description: SlimSAM achieves near original SAM performance using 0.1% of its training data by employing a novel alternate slimming framework and disturbed Taylor pruning, significantly advancing data-efficient mo…

item.title: Sparsity-Agnostic Linear Bandits with Adaptive Adversaries
item.description: SparseLinUCB: First sparse regret bounds for adversarial action sets with unknown sparsity, achieving superior performance over existing methods!

item.title: SpeedLoader: An I/O efficient scheme for heterogeneous and distributed LLM operation
item.description: SpeedLoader: A groundbreaking I/O efficient scheme dramatically boosts LLM training & inference speed on diverse hardware, even with limited resources!

item.title: Stochastic Taylor Derivative Estimator: Efficient amortization for arbitrary differential operators
item.description: Stochastic Taylor Derivative Estimator (STDE) drastically accelerates the optimization of neural networks involving high-dimensional, high-order differential operators by efficiently amortizing comput…

item.title: Uncertainty of Thoughts: Uncertainty-Aware Planning Enhances Information Seeking in LLMs
item.description: Uncertainty of Thoughts (UoT) algorithm significantly boosts LLMs’ information-seeking abilities, leading to substantial performance gains across diverse tasks.

item.title: Unveiling the Hidden Structure of Self-Attention via Kernel Principal Component Analysis
item.description: Self-attention, a key component of transformers, is revealed to be a projection of query vectors onto the principal components of the key matrix, derived from kernel PCA. This novel perspective leads…

item.title: VCR-GauS: View Consistent Depth-Normal Regularizer for Gaussian Surface Reconstruction
item.description: VCR-GauS: Novel view-consistent depth-normal regularizer for superior, real-time 3D surface reconstruction using Gaussian splatting.

item.title: X-Ray: A Sequential 3D Representation For Generation
item.description: X-Ray: A novel 3D representation generating complete object surfaces from a single image!
